snippet.title: Aline - Teaser
snippet.description:
A young girl called Aline is stuck in her bedroom. 

A bed, a closed door, a TV and a game console.

When Aline plays with her console, she sees strange sentences which describe events that have already happened, linked to a strange curse, in disorder. Aline can experience them again by interacting with these sentences. The game switches between multiples places, temporalities and characters to control.

https://twitter.com/kanostuff
https://kano-stuff.itch.io/
